markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Focused Juggler](/Feats.aspx?ID=1188) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 74</row>

**Archetype** [Juggler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=36)

**Prerequisites**
[Juggler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1187)

**Trigger**
Your turn begins.

</column>

---

You continue Juggling until the end of your next turn. Increase the maximum number of items you can [Juggle](/Feats.aspx?ID=1199) by one.
name: Focused Juggler
